title: What contributions has Bill Nye actually made to science? - Quora
tags: Bill Nye The Science Guy (TV series)

response.answer_text: He invented some useful kit whilst working for Boeing, but his greatest contribution, by far, is to explain science to others. He is particularly keen to describe the ‘Scientific Method’ and how ideas become accepted theories, which many ill-educated people don’t understand. He has become a public face who can explain things rationally. He is trying very hard to combat the cult of ignorance found in America today.
